ForecastingSrcRecJudgment.name: ForecastingSrcRecJudgment
ForecastingSrcRecJudgment.description: Represents forecast managersâ€™ judgment of whether they consider an opportunity-related deal to be certain to close.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The currency code of the judgment. If omitted, the default is USD.

JudgmentOwnerId.description: The ID of the forecast manager.

JudgmentValue.description: Whether the deal is likely to close (IN) or not (OUT).

ReferenceObjectId.description: The ID of the opportunity-related object.

Territory2Id.description: The ID of the territory that the judgment is on.
